name: The Endless Ninja: classic arcade jump game
name_original: The Endless Ninja: classic arcade jump game
description:
The classic arcade Ninja adventure begins here. Jump high with this endless ninja one-tap game. 
Enjoy beautiful graphic, challenge friends and share the best scores!

Special Features
 Multiplayer! - show your skills
 Challenge Friends - share your score online!
 Achievements - unlock new Ninjas!
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

The Endless Ninja is completely free to play! Enjoy!

WHAT'S NEW
Hello Ninja lovers! This one is a big one! A lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
